results.name: Triangle T(n,p) read by rows: the number of n-celled polyominoes with perimeter 2p, 2<=p<=1+n.
link: R. J. Mathar, Table of T(n,k) for n <=17
example: The triangle has rows n=1,2,3,... and columns p=2,3,4,5,...:
xref: Cf. A000105 (row sums), A057730 (column sums), A131482 (diagonal), A131487 (skew antidiagonal sums), A027709 (number of leading zeros per row), A100092 (first nonzero in each row).
results.author: _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 07 2021
